Reviews.Title: “Not worth 4 stars !!”
Reviews.Author: gnumarco
Reviews.Content: Not a very nice management team. I asked for a calm room and I had a very noisy one. Don't trust the pictures on the Last Minute Website, the rooms you'll get are small and really not worth 4 stars!! I really think there a many other options in Madrid that are better than this!

Reviews.Title: “Terrible management team”
Reviews.Author: aventurero70
Reviews.Content: I had to pay three rooms , although I had canceled one in advance. I think there are much better options in Madrid for the same price level ( around 100 euros/night)

HotelInfo.Name: Arturo Soria Centre
HotelInfo.Address: Arturo Soria 147, 28043 Madrid, Spain
